# üí´ About Me:
I'm a C# enthusiast and therefore I've always tried to learn C# and its frameworks like .NET and recently I've strarted to learn<br>Blazor web assembly which is a feature of ASP.NET for building interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. .NET running in the browser on WebAssembly.<br>
